scripts.install:all: cd client/Greenhouse_App_Part3-clientside-main/greenhouse-app-part2 && npm install && cd ../../../../server/Greenhouse_App_Part3-serverside-main && npm install
scripts.build: cd client/Greenhouse_App_Part3-clientside-main/greenhouse-app-part2 && npm install && npx ng build --output-path=../../../server/Greenhouse_App_Part3-serverside-main/dist/client
